name: Cyberemo 2007
description:
“Wake up damn you, Emo, we have a lot of veins for cuts!”


Cyberemo 2007 is an adventure indie game that takes place in the CryCity, where tears, pain and body tattoos are most valued. You play as Emo, the guy in search of a way to find peace. You can search for bottles, cigarettes and waste paper, exploring a beautiful world. Your actions will not affect the course of the plot and everything that surrounds you!

Features:

✔️ 30 Levels at release;
✔️ Boss Fights & Cutscenes;
✔️ VERY High difficulty;
✔️ ...and you can choose difficulty levels (Normal & Hard);
✔️ It is very hard to control the character;
✔️ Different characters skin depending on the level;
✔️ Colorful graphics;
✔️ Sonorously soundtrack, by Nitral Music Audiolab

Cyberemo 2007, not a simple game, get ready for a souls-like challenge!
..and don't forget: You are breathtaking!



Important notice! All matches are random. The game consists of jokes, banter and irony. We are not trying to offend anyone. All game content is created as a banter over various aspects of life and activity. The game is filled with humor, jokes and positive. All names, titles, places and events are random. Our game is completely invented and is a parody!
